name: Fury of the Ancients
flavorText: This mantle was crafted by one banished from the sacred mountain, in order to commune with the ancients.
flavorTextHtml: This mantle was crafted by one banished from the sacred mountain, in order to commune with the ancients.

secondary.textHtml: Call of the Ancients gains the effect of the Ancients' Fury rune, and your Ancients attack 100% faster. (Barbarian Only)
secondary.text: Call of the Ancients gains the effect of the Ancients' Fury rune, and your Ancients attack 100% faster. (Barbarian Only)
